soft_skills.phrase: navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the use and development of generative AI technologies like RAG and GPT-4. It details building AI features, integrating AI into products, and abstracting AI providers, aligning directly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
